mapper.select: SELECT /*[CommonService.selectCommCdList] 공통코드 조회*/ COMM_CD AS commCd ,COMM_NM AS commNm ,GRP_CD AS grpCd FROM HMP_COMM_CD WHERE GRP_CD = #{grpCd}
SELECT /*[CommonService.selectFiles] 파일 정보 조회*/ FILE_SNM AS fileSnm , FILE_ONM AS fileOnm , FILE_PATH AS filePath FROM HMP_ATCH_FILE WHERE BBS_ID = #{bbsId}
